name: SearchProducts
description: This test case verifies whether the search bar in the products page works as intended or not and all the products searched using this keyword appear
descriptionHtml: This test case verifies whether the search bar in the products page works as intended or not and all the products searched using this keyword appear
statusMessage:
Product 'rs. 1200
little girls mr. panda shirt
add to cart
view product' does not contain search keyword: Top expected [true] but found [false]
